name: Gucci Jeans
description: NeoStreak men's Brown slim fit stretch jeans brings the trend for the fashion conscious. High on style and quality, these Brown solid pattern jeans are as versatile as they are comfortable - a must have in your wardrobe. Ideal for casual wear, Pair these uber cool jeans with any light color NeoStreak shirt or t-shirt, and never go out of style!.

description: Worn by pioneers; outliers and outcasts. Levi's® Western shirts have been tested by generations and continue to define the modern dress code.
